entries.english: The king rules the land by divine right.
entries.lojban: lo krali cu turni lo stela lo nu cevni dunda
entries.gloss: The king governs the land because deity gives.

entries.english: The strong must protect the weak.
entries.lojban: lo clani cu bandu lo tsali
entries.gloss: The tall ones protect the fragile ones.

entries.lojban: co'a lidne lo do lidne ca'o catra
entries.gloss: Begin to follow your ahead-er while killing continues.

entries.english: The nation stands united under one flag.
entries.lojban: lo natmi cu panra lo nu zvati lo sanmi
entries.gloss: The nation is similar in the event of being-at one symbol.

entries.english: The people need a strong man to lead them.
entries.lojban: xu lo prenu cu nitcu lo clani nanmu lo nu lidne ke'a
entries.gloss: Is it true the people need a tall man for the event of being-ahead?
